headline: Cognizant (CTSH) Valuation Check After New AI-Powered Merchants Fleet Partnership
summary: Cognizant Technology Solutions (CTSH) just deepened its AI credentials, announcing a strategic partnership with Merchants Fleet to modernize fleet operations, billing, and customer service through automation, predictive analytics, and generative AI driven platforms. See our latest analysis for Cognizant Technology Solutions. The market seems to be warming to that narrative, with a 30 day share price return of just over 10 percent and a three year total shareholder return above 40 percent...

headline: Does Cognizant Still Offer Value After Recent Gains and DCF Upside Signals?
summary: If you are wondering whether Cognizant Technology Solutions at around $80 is still a smart buy or if the easy gains are behind it, you are not alone. This breakdown is designed to give you a clear, valuation-first answer. The stock has climbed 4.1% over the last week and 10.1% in the past month, adding to a steady 42.1% gain over three years, even though the 1-year return sits near flat at 0.9%. This can signal a potential reset in expectations rather than a broken story. Recently, the...
